choices.D: outcomes customers are trying to achieve
choices.B: known and unknown features of our product and solutions

questions.question_text: What is the main objective of customer success?
The customer wants to increase the number of services in their portfolio and improve the time to launch these services. Which two business outcomes are appropriate? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: How is increasing the number of services a cost saving activity? It should be business growth!

questions.question_text: What is a lagging indicator of the customer achieving the value proposition?

choices.C: decrease in the number of problem reports

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Contract renewal (B) is a lagging indicator because it shows whether the customer achieved enough value from the solution to continue using it beyond the initial contract period. By renewing, the customer is indicating that past performance met or exceeded expectations.

comments.content: Agreed. I've no idea why D would be though of as a correct answer when B is an option. Clearly there can be no success unless the product is adopted successfully so if there are barriers we need to identify them. If we don't then we can't remove them ergo no success.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BE
Adoption barrier identification helps to identify potential obstacles that could prevent customers from successfully adopting and using the product or service. This allows for the proactive creation of strategies to overcome these barriers and ensure customer success.

KPI tracking involves monitoring key performance indicators (KPIs) that are aligned with customer success goals. This helps to measure progress towards these goals and identify areas where improvements can be made to ensure customer success.

questions.question_text: Which two activities support Customer Success planning? (Choose two.)
What is a business adoption barrier?

discussion.content:

Lack of stakeholder is a business barrier (ignore my previous answer).

Lack of stakeholder is a business barrier

Selected Answer: B
A. Solution is not implemented is a consequence of a business adoption barrier.
D, they are asking for business barrier

Selected Answer: A
Hesitating between the two answers A&D, surely not B.
